A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was satisfied with every character in the movie. Thought the plot was a little slow at the start but it really got going at the end. Mark Hamil gave his best on screen performance yet as luke skywalker. Carrie fisher\, rest in peace princess\, was amazing in this movie. Adam driver was great\, overall I enjoyed the movie and it definitely makes my top 3 star wars movies.
